Hotmail Views SharkPort/X-Port Saves as Viruses?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Hotmail Views SharkPort/X-Port Saves as Viruses?
By Lisa Shock on Friday, December 17, 2004 - 09:21 pm:

Right now, it looks like an upgrade to hotmail now prevents users form sending or receiving SharkPort or XPort files because it identifies them as viruses, even if zipped. I will post a new email address for tourneys soon.

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, December 18, 2004 - 07:53 pm:

Looks like it isn't just hotmail involved now. We may have to create a 'safe list' for email providers.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, December 27, 2004 - 04:26 pm:

So far, Yahoo! and Gmail work.
